summary: Test suite for the PolicyRulesAdminPage UI component, containing helper functions to construct mock application state and verify that the page correctly creates its widgets, loads groups, users, objects and subjects, handles loading exceptions, updates detail views, clears selections when switching tabs, and dispatches appropriate Redux actions and notifications.
business_intent: Ensure the policy rules administration interface operates reliably by testing data loading, error handling, UI updates, and integration with the Redux store, thereby supporting accurate management of access control lists.
